com.biorecorder.edflib.filters

Class EdfSignalsFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.biorecorder.edflib.base.EdfWriter
      • com.biorecorder.edflib.filters.EdfFilter
        • com.biorecorder.edflib.filters.EdfSignalsFilter

  • public class EdfSignalsFilter
extends EdfFilter
    Permits to realize some kind of transformation (digital filtering) with the data samples belonging to some signals (add digital filters to some signals).
    See Also:
    SignalFilter, MovingAverageFilter

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      EdfSignalsFilter(EdfWriter out)

      Indicate that the given filter should be applied to the samples belonging to the given signal in DataRecords

    • Method Detail

      • addSignalFilter

        public void addSignalFilter(int signalNumber,
                            SignalFilter signalFilter)
        Indicate that the given filter should be applied to the samples belonging to the given signal in DataRecords
        Parameters:
        signalFilter - digital filter that will be applied to the samples
        signalNumber - number of the channel (signal) to whose samples the filter should be applied to. Numbering starts from 0.

      • writeDigitalSamples

        public void writeDigitalSamples(int[] digitalSamples,
                                int offset,
                                int length)
        Description copied from class: EdfFilter
        Calls the same method of its underlying EdfWriter and pass to it data samples.
        Overrides:
        writeDigitalSamples in class EdfFilter
        Parameters:
        digitalSamples - data array with digital samples
        offset - the start offset in the data.
        length - the number of bytes to write.
